properties.name: geodata.geolite2.source
properties.description: The URL for downloading the the GeoLite2 data

properties.name: geodata.min-data-age
properties.description: The minimum age of the data before the data is considered for update

properties.name: data.tmp.directory
properties.description: The directory where the server should store the downloaded temporary geodata files

properties.name: data.directory
properties.description: The directory where the server should store the geodata server's 'files

properties.name: geodata.boundaries.quality
properties.description: An arbitray number used to tweak the quality of boundaries used for preview. Higher numbers give higher quality

properties.name: geodata.geonames.source.alternatenames
properties.description: The URL for downloading the GeoNames.org alternate names data

properties.name: geodata.geonames.source.country
properties.description: The URL for downloading the GeoNames.org country data

properties.name: geodata.geonames.source.boundaries
properties.description: The URL for downloading the GeoNames.org boundary data

properties.name: geodata.geonames.source.hierarchy
properties.description: The URL for downloading the GeoNames.org hierarchy data

properties.name: geodata.geonames.source.names
properties.description: The URL for downloading the main GeoNames.org data

properties.name: geodata.geonames.features.excluded
properties.description: GeoNames.org featureCodes that are to be excluded from the data import
